personalInfo.name: Shanvi Soni
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.tagline: Passionate B.Tech Computer Science student crafting beautiful, user-focused web applications with modern technologies

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

responsibilities: Working on live gaming platforms for USA users, enhancing React-based applications and delivering updates
Improved and extended frontend components, while maintaining performance and code quality in a shared codebase
Developing an Expression of Interest (EOI) management SaaS platform for Australian migration agents
Building secure client portals with multi-step wizards, document uploads, and real-time status tracking
Implementing role-based dashboards, OCR-assisted validation, and SkillSelect API integrations
Working with modern technologies including Java, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Docker, and React.js to build scalable and maintainable solutions
Developed a recruitment ecosystem that helps companies fill positions 40% faster while increasing the rate of retention candidates by 20%
Worked with technologies like React.js, Redux, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Node.js, Express
Built full-stack features including user authentication, job posting, referral management systems
Collaborated with the development team to implement new features and maintain code quality standards
Contributed to client projects, Built features used by 2000+ users
Built frontend components with React.js and secure APIs with NestJS & Express, delivering end-to-end
Collaborated via Git workflows and peer reviews to ensure clean, maintainable, and production-ready code

summary: I'm a motivated B.Tech Computer Science student at SAGE University, Bhopal, with a strong passion for full-stack development. Currently maintaining a CGPA of 8.38, I combine academic excellence with hands-on industry experience.

As a Full Stack Developer at iWin Infotech and Software Developer at The KnN Migration, I'm working on live gaming platforms and EOI management SaaS, building secure portals and features with React, Java, Spring Boot, and modern tooling.
With experience at EndorseSphere Ventures and Reactify Labs, I bring both technical expertise and collaborative skills to every project I work on.
